FFlagAXDisableCategoryPillsOnCatalogSear.purpose: It simplifies the search process, making it easier for players to find what they are looking for without unnecessary filters.

FFlagCreateConnectionInternalEarlierServ.mechanism: This flag allows the server to establish connections with players sooner in the game loading process.
FFlagCreateConnectionInternalEarlierServ.purpose: This helps players start playing faster by reducing wait times when joining a game.

FFlagFixIsrDeferredPropResize.mechanism: This flag fixes an issue where certain properties of game objects were not resizing correctly when deferred.
FFlagFixIsrDeferredPropResize.purpose: It ensures that game objects display correctly, improving the visual experience for players.

DFFlagISRBlockStaleCFrameImprovements.mechanism: This flag enhances how the game handles outdated position data for objects, preventing them from causing issues.
DFFlagISRBlockStaleCFrameImprovements.purpose: It improves game stability and performance, making gameplay smoother for players.

FFlagAXMigrateCommunityAvatarEntryButton.mechanism: This flag changes how the community avatar entry button is referenced in the game code, making it more efficient.
FFlagAXMigrateCommunityAvatarEntryButton.purpose: This streamlines the process of accessing community avatars, making it easier for players to customize their characters.

FFlagLrMainMetrics.mechanism: This flag enables tracking of key performance metrics in the game, helping developers understand player behavior.
FFlagLrMainMetrics.purpose: It helps improve the overall game experience by allowing developers to make informed decisions based on player data.

FFlagAXCategoryPillColorAnimationInstant.mechanism: Disables the instant color change animation for category pills in the UI.
FFlagAXCategoryPillColorAnimationInstant.purpose: Makes the user interface smoother and less distracting by removing sudden color changes.

FFlagAXOutlineSubcategoryPill.mechanism: Adds an outline to subcategory pills in the UI for better visibility.
FFlagAXOutlineSubcategoryPill.purpose: Helps players easily identify and differentiate between different subcategories in the interface.

FFlagLuaAppAddSortDataToSocialCarouselCl.mechanism: Enhances the social carousel feature by adding sorting data when players click on it.
FFlagLuaAppAddSortDataToSocialCarouselCl.purpose: Improves the organization of social features, making it easier for players to find friends and groups.

FFlagAXExternalItemDetailsOverlay.mechanism: Introduces an overlay that shows detailed information about items from external sources.
FFlagAXExternalItemDetailsOverlay.purpose: Gives players more information about items they are interested in, enhancing their shopping experience.

FFlagVoiceChatEnableSdpCompressionMaster.mechanism: Enables a new method for compressing voice chat data to improve performance.
FFlagVoiceChatEnableSdpCompressionMaster.purpose: Reduces lag and improves the quality of voice chat, making communication smoother for players.

FFlagAXQuickButtonsFrameShouldAlwaysExis.mechanism: This flag ensures that a specific frame for quick buttons is always present in the user interface.
FFlagAXQuickButtonsFrameShouldAlwaysExis.purpose: It allows players to access quick action buttons more easily, improving their gameplay experience.

FFlagExtendLightRangeTo120HideRolloutPro.mechanism: This flag increases the range of lights in the game to 120 units and hides certain properties related to this change.
FFlagExtendLightRangeTo120HideRolloutPro.purpose: It enhances the visual experience by allowing lights to illuminate larger areas, making the game look better.

DFFlagInferredCrashReportToBacktraceRegi.mechanism: This flag enables a system to automatically report crashes to a backend service for analysis.
DFFlagInferredCrashReportToBacktraceRegi.purpose: It helps developers identify and fix issues faster, leading to a more stable and enjoyable game for players.

FFlagSolverV2RefactorReplicationStateUpd.mechanism: This flag updates how game states are replicated across players, improving the efficiency of data sharing.
FFlagSolverV2RefactorReplicationStateUpd.purpose: It ensures that players see the same game state more quickly and accurately, enhancing multiplayer experiences.

FFlagNetworkInterface.mechanism: This flag modifies the way the game communicates over the network, improving data handling.
FFlagNetworkInterface.purpose: It provides smoother online gameplay by reducing lag and connection issues for players.

FFlagAXUseDefaultFocusHandlerInFocusedWi.mechanism: This flag enables a standard way to manage focus for widgets when they are at the top of the content area.
FFlagAXUseDefaultFocusHandlerInFocusedWi.purpose: It helps players navigate through the game interface more smoothly, making it easier to interact with different elements.

FFlagAddDismissTopBarFocus.mechanism: This flag allows players to remove focus from the top bar of the game interface.
FFlagAddDismissTopBarFocus.purpose: It gives players more control over their navigation, making it easier to focus on the game itself without distractions.

FFlagVoiceChatEnableSdpCompressionMaster.mechanism: This flag enables a new method of compressing voice chat data to improve performance.
FFlagVoiceChatEnableSdpCompressionMaster.purpose: It enhances the quality and efficiency of voice chat, making communication clearer and more reliable for players.

FFlagCapturesAddSavePromptVideoLog.mechanism: This flag adds a prompt that asks players if they want to save a video log of their gameplay captures.
FFlagCapturesAddSavePromptVideoLog.purpose: It allows players to keep a record of their gameplay, which can be useful for sharing highlights or reviewing their performance.

FFlagUITextureRendererUseNewRenderPath.mechanism: This flag switches the way textures are rendered in the user interface to a new method.
FFlagUITextureRendererUseNewRenderPath.purpose: It aims to improve the visual quality and performance of UI elements, making them look better and run smoother.

FFlagUITextureRendererUseNewRenderPath_S.mechanism: Similar to the previous flag, but this one is used for testing the new rendering method before full implementation.
FFlagUITextureRendererUseNewRenderPath_S.purpose: It allows developers to identify any issues with the new rendering method in a controlled environment, ensuring a better experience when it goes live.

FFlagAddTopBarScrim.mechanism: This flag adds a semi-transparent overlay to the top bar of the game interface.
FFlagAddTopBarScrim.purpose: It enhances the visibility of the top bar, making it easier for players to see and interact with it, especially in busy game scenes.

DFIntProductInfoBatchingMaxSize_PlaceFil.mechanism: This flag sets a limit on how many product information requests can be processed at once when filtering places.
DFIntProductInfoBatchingMaxSize_PlaceFil.purpose: It helps manage the load on the system, ensuring that players can quickly find and access the products they want without slowdowns.

FFlagExtendedLightRangesFixDirtyCrash.mechanism: This flag fixes issues related to lighting ranges that could cause the game to crash.
FFlagExtendedLightRangesFixDirtyCrash.purpose: It improves game stability by preventing crashes related to lighting, ensuring a smoother gameplay experience for players.

FFlagReconnectToSameServer_Staged.mechanism: This flag allows players to reconnect to the same game server they were on if they get disconnected.
FFlagReconnectToSameServer_Staged.purpose: It helps players continue their game without losing progress or having to start over.

FFlagAXAddStyleToItemCardPriceLine.mechanism: This flag changes the appearance of the price display on item cards in the game.
FFlagAXAddStyleToItemCardPriceLine.purpose: It makes it easier for players to see and understand the prices of items they want to buy.

FFlagStudioFixStandalonePluginUnloadingA.mechanism: This flag improves how plugins are unloaded in Roblox Studio, making the process smoother.
FFlagStudioFixStandalonePluginUnloadingA.purpose: It helps developers work more efficiently by reducing errors when they load and unload tools in their development environment.

DFIntLoadTestStartTimeUnix_PlaceFilter.mechanism: This flag sets a specific time for testing how well places load in Roblox.
DFIntLoadTestStartTimeUnix_PlaceFilter.purpose: It helps developers understand and improve the loading times of their games, leading to a better experience for players.

FFlagIncreaseEffectiveLightGridRadius.mechanism: This flag increases the area where lighting effects are applied in the game.
FFlagIncreaseEffectiveLightGridRadius.purpose: It enhances the visual quality of games by making lighting more realistic and effective over a larger area.

FFlagLuaAppAddSchemaFieldsToGameClicks.mechanism: This flag adds extra data fields to the way game clicks are recorded in the Lua application.
FFlagLuaAppAddSchemaFieldsToGameClicks.purpose: It helps developers gather more detailed information about how players interact with their games, improving game design and user experience.

DFFlagVideoWinHwEncoderDeleteIfNoPool.mechanism: This flag controls whether to remove hardware video encoders if there are no available resources.
DFFlagVideoWinHwEncoderDeleteIfNoPool.purpose: It ensures that the system runs efficiently by freeing up resources that are not being used, which can lead to better performance during video playback.

FFlagIsrMainMetrics.mechanism: This flag enables the collection of main performance metrics for the Roblox platform.
FFlagIsrMainMetrics.purpose: It allows Roblox to monitor and improve the overall performance and stability of the platform, leading to a smoother experience for players.

FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Stag.mechanism: This flag adds version history metadata to places in the Roblox platform.
FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Stag.purpose: It helps developers keep track of changes made to their games over time, making it easier to manage updates and improvements.

FFlagVoiceAddWebrtClosedTransitionEnable.mechanism: This flag enables a new transition feature for voice chat using WebRTC technology.
FFlagVoiceAddWebrtClosedTransitionEnable.purpose: It improves the quality and reliability of voice communication in games, enhancing social interactions among players.

FFlagAddFriendsEmptyStateUpdate.mechanism: This flag updates the way the friends list displays when there are no friends added.
FFlagAddFriendsEmptyStateUpdate.purpose: It makes it clearer for players what to do when their friends list is empty, encouraging them to add friends.

FFlagVoiceChatClientRewrite_OneFlagToRul.mechanism: This flag rewrites the voice chat system to improve its performance and reliability.
FFlagVoiceChatClientRewrite_OneFlagToRul.purpose: It enhances the voice chat experience for players, making it easier and more stable to communicate with friends during games.
